info.title: p-tray
info.description:
This is an application for managing user projects

Git commit: e590f4268fd085966280433d2dfcf14b2c38131b
Git branch: develop
Build time: Wed, 17 Sep 2025 15:34:20 +0400

delete.description: Deletes task boards by provided ID

put.description: Update task's comment specified by id

delete.description: Deletes task's comment specified by id

get.description: Get project by database id for current logged in user
lists all templates for which the user has access

post.description: Creates new template with tasks attached

get.summary: Find all target groups by project id

get.description: Provides search by name for tag categories

post.description: Creates task board for specified project

get.description: lists all projects for which the user has access, if no projects found creates a 'DEFAULT' project and return

post.description: Creates task workflow for provided project

post.summary: Unsubscribe current user from project alert job notifications by 'alertJobId'
Unsubscribe many users from project alert job notifications by 'alertJobId'

post.description: Adds comment to task specified by id

get.description: Returns comment's attachments as a list of detailed info

post.description: Creates attachment for task comment specified by ID

get.description: Returns task's attachments as a list of detailed info

post.description: Creates attachment for task specified by ID

post.summary: Add batch of targets to a project
Subscribe current user to project alert job notifications by 'alertJobId'
Subscribe many users to project alert job notifications by 'alertJobId'

get.summary: Get all folders and artifacts for a project

post.summary: Unsubscribe everyone from the 'alertJobId' (called by xda after alert job deletion)
Add artifact to a project by System

delete.description: Delete project artifacts by list of IDs

post.summary: Upload artifact to a project by User
Add alerts to a project and send notifications
Find all subscription to an alert job by 'alertJobId'
